summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2006 CHEVROLET HHR.  THE DRIVER SIDE FRONT INTERIOR DOOR HANDLE FAILED.  THE WINDOW WAS ROLLED DOWN AND THE DOOR HAD TO BE OPENED FROM THE OUTSIDE.  THE DEALER STATED THAT IN ORDER TO REPLACE THE HANDLE, THE CONTACT WOULD NEED TO PURCHASE A NEW INTERIOR DOOR FRAME.  THE CAUSE OF THE FAILURE WAS UNKNOWN.  THERE WERE NO PRIOR FAILURES WITH THE DOOR OR HANDLE.  THE CURRENT AND FAILURE MILEAGES WERE 36,485.   UPDATED 01/17/08  *BF    UPDATED 01/17/08  *TR
